price: Wala hawakufarikiana walio pewa Kitabu ila baada ya kuwajia hiyo bayana.
arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ
footnotes: Wala hawakufarikiana walio pewa Kitabu katika Mayahudi na Wakristo, ila baada ya kuwajia hiyo hoja iliyo wazi yenye kuonyesha ya kwamba Muhammad ndiye huyo Mtume wa Mwenyezi Mungu aliye ahidiwa katika Vitabu vyao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā tafarraqa alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba illā min baʿdi mā jāathumu al-bayinatu
